servinfo.title: Electric Throttle Body Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Throttle Body and Intake Manifold Components:For M16A Engine with VVT
Throttle Body On-Vehicle Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Detach breather union (1) from air intake pipe (2).
Disconnect engine coolant hoses (1) from electric throttle body assembly (3).
Disconnect connector (2) from electric throttle body assembly.
Remove electric throttle body assembly from intake manifold.
Clean mating surfaces and install new throttle body gasket to intake manifold.
Install electric throttle body assembly (1) to intake manifold.
Connect connector (2) to electric throttle body assembly securely.
Connect engine coolant hoses (3) to electric throttle body assembly (1).
Connect air intake pipe (1) and breather union (2).
Tighten air intake pipe bolt (3) to specified torque.
Refill coolant referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill .
Perform calibration of electric throttle body assembly referring to Electric Throttle Body System Calibration if replaced.
